Have you ever gone over the speed limit? If so, not only are you setting a bad example for your kids because you are cheating, but you are also putting your and your kids lives in danger. Tell me if the Patriots are guilty of doing this, why does the penalty have to be so severe, especially when other QBs, namely Aaron Rogers and Brad Johnson BOTH admitted to doctoring the footballs they used. Does that mean that the Super Bowls they won should be stripped from those teams? What is going on is the New York media hates the Patriots and to hype this infraction is a witch hunt to get all NY fans who hate the Pats to give them ratings. Lisa, I'm afraid you are being manipulated.

yes

I find it fascinating that anyone would want their relatives remains resting far from home. I can't imagine veteran or not, resting so far removed from my place of worship and community. Ive visited the cemetery at Arlington. I was moved by its beauty and its monument to the dead. The changing of the guard at the tomb of the unknown soldiers was moving as well. Still I can't imagine placing anyone I love there so far away from home.
